rooms.description: Entry point with minimalist design, Vastu-compliant orientation ensuring auspicious entrance.
Open-plan living area integrated with kitchen; minimalistic furniture and ample natural light from West exposure, aligning with Vastu for social interactions.
Open plan kitchen adjoining the living area, designed with minimalist aesthetics and functional layout; placement ensures good energy flow per Vastu.
Dedicated home office space with quiet environment and east-west view to ensure productivity while adhering to Vastu guidelines for workspace.
Small bathroom in the living area, minimalistic design ensuring practicality and ease of cleaning.
Master bedroom with a private balcony oriented towards the central courtyard to maximize natural ventilation and light; placed per Vastu for relaxation.
Secondary bedroom, minimalist design with sufficient storage; strategically located near the living area but ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Large windows to enhance daylight and provide an unobstructed view of the courtyard
Windows to maintain balance in energy flow as per Vastu guidelines
